Hi all,
I am very new to this group so excuse myself if I do anything wrong=
.
I am currently working at the French National Library : BNF
We use Heritr=
ix version 1.14.4 along with NetarchiveSuite.

We are planning hour yearly =
Snapshot crawl and we would like to clean the seeds list excluding the non =
responding DNS.

we have 2 solutions : 1/ develop hour own software solutio=
n
2/ try to use heritrix to do this for us.

Does anybody done such a thing=
 ?

Is there any proper Heritrix configuration you could advice to achieve =
this 

PS : we would like to know for the valid seeds if there is a redirec=
tion and if so, the redirected url

Thanks in advance guys.
